data.name: Backup.title
data.comment: label for backup recovery title

data.name: Backup.button
data.comment: label for backup recovery button

data.name: Backup.header
data.value: Your backup recovery key is the only way to restore your wallet if your phone is lost, stolen, broken or upgraded.
data.comment: label for backup recovery header

data.name: Backup.subheader
data.value: We will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
data.comment: label for backup recovery subheader

data.name: BackupConfirm.header
data.value: To make sure everything was written down correctly, please enter the following words from your backup recovery key.
data.comment: label for backup confirmation

data.name: BackupConfirm.warning
data.value: That word is not in your mnemonic.
data.comment: label for backup confirmation warning

data.name: BackupConfirm.exercise
data.value: Choose the {0} word from your mnemonic:
data.comment: label for backup confirmation exercise

data.name: AckRisk.button
data.comment: label for the button of the Acknowledge Risk of Non-Custodial view

data.name: AckRisk.term1
data.value: I understand that not properly backing up my wallet can lead to loss of funds.
data.comment: label for the first term of the Acknowledge Risk of Non-Custodial view

data.name: AckRisk.term2
data.value: I will not take a screen shot of my key.
data.comment: label for the second term of the Acknowledge Risk of Non-Custodial view

data.name: AckRisk.term3
data.value: I understand that Hodl Wallet does not store a copy of this key and should I lose it Hodl Wallet can't help me recover my funds.
data.comment: label for the third term of the Acknowledge Risk of Non-Custodial view

data.name: AckRisk.term4
data.value: I am ready to copy down the words of my Backup Recovery Key and store it.
data.comment: label for the fourth term of the Acknowledge Risk of Non-Custodial view

data.name: AckRisk.title
data.comment: label for the title of the Acknowledge Risk of Non-Custodial view

data.name: NewWallet.body
data.value:
Before we get started you should know:
Hodl Wallet is a non-custodial Bitcoin Wallet. This means you are the sole person with access to the bitcoin stored in this app.
All you have to do is safety store the wallets backup recovery key and you'll always have access to you bitcoin.
data.comment: label for main message on New Wallet view

data.name: NewWallet.button
data.comment: label for button on New Wallet view

data.name: NewWallet.header
data.comment: label for header of message on New Wallet view

data.name: NewWallet.title
data.comment: label for titel of New Wallet view
